forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. Southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, the skyline basks under a serene blanket of sunshine, where the morning's chill gives way to a gentle warmth. Currently, the mercury hovers around the refreshing mid-sixties, yet a cool breeze whispers through the streets, reminding us of the city's distinctive maritime influence. The forecast carries the promise of a mostly clear stretch as the sun ascends, yet some fog lingers at the edges of vision, hinting at the presence of a marine layer beyond the Golden Gate—a reminder of the ocean's closeness. 

With evening's approach, temperatures will gracefully settle into the comforting embrace of the low fifties, making this a fine time to layer with a light jacket or sweater—a nod to the classic San Francisco unpredictability. For an afternoon well spent, consider a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, perhaps making your way from the lush expanses of Golden Gate Park towards the lively corners of the Ferry Building, where the essence of the day perfectly mingles with the aroma of fresh artisanal fare. Each breath in this vibrant atmosphere promises unique pleasures, just as each fleeting moment invites you to create a memory—minus the clichés of postcards and travel brochures.
